name: Decide
description:
To commemorate our successes in quitting harmful things. It's been 7 years since I decided to quit smoking during a long trip. As I was leaving for the airport, a friend offered me a pack of cigarettes and a lighter, "just in case." I did not accept the offer because my plan was to quit smoking and not merely to try.

3000px X 3000px by @natlarrode.

* This image has been printed in a limited edition of 10 signed and numbered copies.

All rights reserved by the artist.
